version_description:
1. Add a new function, Send Gifts.
2. Add a new function, Recommend Match.
3. Add a new function, Verified Player. Explorers can hit the Verify button in the lower left corner of the main interface to view the verified players of the current server.

1. Add a new function, Send Gifts.
2. Add a new function, Recommend Match.
3. Add a new function, Verified Player. Explorers can hit the Verify button in the lower left corner of the main interface to view the verified players of the current server.

1. The all-new high tech Railgun has arrived! This rare and lethal weapon packs a sustained and powerful punch. The greater the range, the greater the damage!
2. Added Weekly Pass and Monthly Pass: Players can get diamond immediately after purchase, and then get extra diamonds and star coins when logging in daily.
3. Added a new event, Top-up Gifts: Receive a permanent suit reward when you accumulate different top-up values during the event period.

1. The all-new high tech Railgun has arrived! This rare and lethal weapon packs a sustained and powerful punch. The greater the range, the greater the damage!
2. Added Weekly Pass and Monthly Pass: Players can get diamond immediately after purchase, and then get extra diamonds and star coins when logging in daily.
3. Added a new event, Top-up Gifts: Receive a permanent suit reward when you accumulate different top-up values during the event period.

1. The all-new Plasma SMG has arrived!
2. UI Adjustment for Supply and Depot.
3. Added Guilds.

1. The all-new Plasma SMG has arrived!
2. UI Adjustment for Supply and Depot.
3. Added Guilds.

1. Added a new item Electrified Land Mine: Once placed on the floor, enemies within a 2m radius will take 50 Damage and be stunned for 2 seconds.
2. Added Nationality option.

1. Added a new item Electrified Land Mine: Once placed on the floor, enemies within a 2m radius will take 50 Damage and be stunned for 2 seconds.
2. Added Nationality option.

1. In order to celebrate the launch of Blast Mode, the RPG can also be picked up in Classic Mode (except for Airdrops).
2. The all-new Gatling Gun has arrived! This is a weapon with high firing rate and strong power that can destroy everything!

1. In order to celebrate the launch of Blast Mode, the RPG can also be picked up in Classic Mode (except for Airdrops).
2. The all-new Gatling Gun has arrived! This is a weapon with high firing rate and strong power that can destroy everything!

1. The all-new Three Forces mode is available.
2. The all-new Stinger SMG has arrived! This weapon can track enemies and will trigger explosive damage upon hitting the same enemy for 7 times in a row!

1. The all-new Three Forces mode is available.
2. The all-new Stinger SMG has arrived! This weapon can track enemies and will trigger explosive damage upon hitting the same enemy for 7 times in a row!

1. The all-new Quick Mode is available.
2. The Bunny series of Looks and Packs will be removed from the Supply Shop and a new destructor skin Chopper will be available.

1. The all-new Quick Mode is available.
2. The Bunny series of Looks and Packs will be removed from the Supply Shop and a new destructor skin Chopper will be available.

1. The new weapon Power Rifle has arrived! The Power Rifle fires big Plasma Bullets. The closer the bullet center is to the target, the more damage it will deal.
2. Weapon adjustments.

1. The new weapon Power Rifle has arrived! The Power Rifle fires big Plasma Bullets. The closer the bullet center is to the target, the more damage it will deal.
2. Weapon adjustments.

1. Fully upgraded classic map. An all-new Aurora Valley is waiting for you!
2. Season 3 officially starts!
3. Halloween Event officially begins!

1. Fully upgraded classic map. An all-new Aurora Valley is waiting for you!
2. Season 3 officially starts!
3. Halloween Event officially begins!

1. Launch All-new Holey Battle Mode.
2. All-new Dance Moves now available in Mall.
3. Added Record function.

1. Launch All-new Holey Battle Mode.
2. All-new Dance Moves now available in Mall.
3. Added Record function.

1. All-new looks available.
2. Guild Optimizations.
3. All-new trap Gas Bomb is available.

1. All-new looks available.
2. Guild Optimizations.
3. All-new trap Gas Bomb is available.

1. Soccer Royale is back with new rules and features!
2. Weapon Adjustments.

1. Soccer Royale is back with new rules and features!
2. Weapon Adjustments.

1. Black Friday Sale, Thanksgiving Events!
2. Photon Emitter joins the battlefield.

1. Black Friday Sale, Thanksgiving Events!
2. Photon Emitter joins the battlefield.

1. New Map Carnival event officially launched!
2. New daily flash sale added.
3. Custom Build function adjusted.

1. New Map Carnival event officially launched!
2. New daily flash sale added.
3. Custom Build function adjusted.

1. New gadget, Magnetic Shield added.
2. Adjustments have been made to the New Classic mode.
3. Holey Battle is back!

1. New gadget, Magnetic Shield added.
2. Adjustments have been made to the New Classic mode.
3. Holey Battle is back!

1. Shop Adjustments.
2. Matching Optimizations.
3. Weapon Issues Fixed.

1. Shop Adjustments.
2. Matching Optimizations.
3. Weapon Issues Fixed.

1. Christmas Events coming soon!
2. Limited discount when creating guild.
3. All-new weapon, F-1 Guided RPG now available.

1. Christmas Events coming soon!
2. Limited discount when creating guild.
3. All-new weapon, F-1 Guided RPG now available.

1. Defend the Captain is back.
2. Season 4 officially starts!

1. Defend the Captain is back.
2. Season 4 officially starts!

1. Adjusted Traps and Gadgets.
2. Enhanced the display effects of throwables. Explorers can now view the special explosive effects of certain throwables on the display interface.

1. Monthly Sale available.
2. Optimized the trajectory effect when shooting.

1. The Valentine's Day event is here!
2. The all-new gadget, the Ejection Seat, has arrived.

1. Optimized real-time voice chat.
2. Modified the Airstrike Remote's damage source modifier.

1. Performance optimizations.
2. Store updates.

1. The airship has resumed operation.
2. Various bug fixes.

1. Added vehicles and other items to Creative Island. You can now dig up land in Creative Island.
2. The all-new wingman Scourge of the Sea is now available in the Store.

1. New Goods in store.
2. Various bug fixes.

1. The Carnival event is coming!
2. Dive into the all-new battlefield: Hunting Grounds!
3. All-new gadgets and items to up your game!

1. All-new orange rarity Dawnbreaker character sets Crimson Battlebug Hercules and Scuttle Spirit Hera are now on sale!
2. Medal Mode is back!

1. All-new orange rarity Dawnbreaker character sets Crimson Battlebug Hercules and Scuttle Spirit Hera are now on sale!

The all-new #GBumblebee Battlefield#l mode has arrived! Creative Destruction teams up with Hasbro for an all-new gameplay experience! Bumblebee Battlefield mode sees the thrilling debut of vehicle-based combat in Creative Destruction! Fight off your foes as Bumblebee in his vehicle form, and gather energy to transform into his Autobot form! Gear up for an all-new and unique battle experience!

The all-new #GBumblebee Battlefield#l mode has arrived! Creative Destruction teams up with Hasbro for an all-new gameplay experience! Bumblebee Battlefield mode sees the thrilling debut of vehicle-based combat in Creative Destruction! Fight off your foes as Bumblebee in his vehicle form, and gather energy to transform into his Autobot form! Gear up for an all-new and unique battle experience!
